attributes.action: Seize the assets of the families of Suicide Bombers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This will play on the mind of would be suicide bombers- as they will know they will directly hurt their own loved ones by carrying out their selfish act.

Assets of the parents (although an irrelevant, miniscule amount) will be seized to help aid victims, to further resources and to deter further attacks.

You are far less likley to blow yourself up and cause mass murder if you knew your family will directly suffer as a result of your actions.
